document.full_text: authorities in new jersey said on friday they arrested a burglar on charges of stealing $500,000 in jewelry and other goods from rock star jon bon jovi and three of his neighbors during a month-long break-in spree.
document.title: jon bon jovi jewelry burglar arrested
lines_and_colors: authorities in new jersey said on friday they arrested a burglar on charges of stealing $500,000 in jewelry and other goods from rock star jon bon jovi and three of his neighbors during a month-long break-in spree.
